Themes change the look and feel of your site, but not the content. To change the theme, "Go to=>Control Panel=>Site Pages" or "Manage=>Site Pages" in the dock bar above. To see how the horizonal navigation bar tabs can be reconfigured to be vertical, try the Drupal Garland or Wordpress Kubrick themes. The Classic theme will show child pages in the horizonla navigation bar menu, if you hover over the Welcome and Personalization pages.
